TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UIBarItem/Notifications extends System.Object

remarks.para: This is a static class which contains various helper methods that allow developers to observe events posted in the iOS notification hub ().
The methods defined in this class post events invoke the provided method or lambda with a parameter which contains strongly typed properties for the notification arguments.

MemberSignature.Value: public static MonoTouch.Foundation.NSObject ObserveAnnouncementDidFinish (EventHandler<MonoTouch.UIKit.UIAccessibilityAnnouncementFinishedEventArgs> handler);

.method public static hidebysig class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSObject ObserveAnnouncementDidFinish(class System.EventHandler`1<class MonoTouch.UIKit.UIAccessibilityAnnouncementFinishedEventArgs> handler) cil managed

Docs.param: Method to invoke when the notification is posted.
Docs.summary: Accessibility notification, posted when the system has finished reading an announcement.
Docs.returns: The returned NSObject represents the registered notification.
